topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1 and 1.1.1: DNSaaS Installation and Configuration

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion Openstack 1.1: DNSaaS Installation and Configuration

othermeta.name: role
othermeta.content: Michael B, Gerladine K, Graham H,

body.p: From ~/git/documentation/, use the following to copy this file from the beta 2 branch: git checkout hos2.0beta2 -- ./helion/neutron/1.1commercial_neutron-post-installation-configure-DNaaS.dita
